person.persName: Curran P. Ray (Ballard County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Ellen Ray. Father of Louis Ray, John S. Ray, Curran Ray, Fannie Ray, Richard Ray, Bell Ray, George Ray, and Elissa Ray. Merchant in Ballard County in 1850. Retired merchant in Ballard County in 1860. Captain in the 7th Regiment Kentucky Mounted Infantry in the Confederate States Army from August 1861 to May 1862.
